name: ocean reef crochet water bottle holder
notes:
> this pattern is available for [free on my blog][1]. the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern (including all photo tutorials), in one printable file without advertisements.

learn how to crochet this fun crochet water bottle holder to take on your everyday adventures. a water bottle holder is the perfect solution to staying hydrated, all while keeping your hands free when you’re out on your daily walk, or just walking around the grocery store.

**3 size & 4 strap options**

* 3 water bottle holder sizes included: standard, medium, & large
* 4 strap options included: easy crochet strap, carabiner strap, stationary crochet rope, adjustable crochet rope

choose the right strap option for you! wear the water bottle bag on one shoulder or as a crossbody bag.

**yarn**
lion brand yarns 24/7 cotton was used for this pattern. other worsted weight yarns can easily be substituted.

water bottle bag design is an a crocheted simplicity original design.
